TextView.android:text: “Furni Rent”, an app designed for those who are not in the best position to pay the full price for the furniture for their place, may it be a Couch, a dining table, a bed or even a chair. We all know how high the prices are flying in the market of Furniture, let alone the high end ones.Furni Rent brings you a platform to design the home you’ve always dreamt of in a much affordable way.
